configuration.allowedFileTypes: File types that can be added to the merge queue (VSCode language identifiers)
configuration.showDataFileContent: Whether to show the entire code of data files such as JSON and YAML. If false, only the structure is displayed.
configuration.categories: List of categories in the merged file. Used for file classification.
configuration.promptSnippets: Templates that can be inserted when creating prompts
